function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Non-contact interaction activities weakening spatial and temporal constraints","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate replacement of physical space with virtual space for gathering and communicating","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adjustment of community office facilities to integrate non-contact and physical services","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on non-contact interaction","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High reliance on online teaching during covid-19","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on online education during covid-19","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between physical and virtual elements in community planning","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of multisource data, arcgis, and una for community planning","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reconfiguration of urban space due to technology","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased dependence on the internet due to covid-19","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Introduction of non-contact interaction applications for urban community development","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prevalence of non-contact interactions in community planning","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate representation of covid-19 topics in the kg","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Openkg-covid19 not being updated daily","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High false match rate in schema matching due to similarity measure","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low-quality literal information in kgs may affect entity alignment performance","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited schema overlaps and entity matches between kgs","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of fact numbers for different properties in openkg-covid19","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of central schema for covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of advanced methods in knowledge extraction","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Majority of cord-19 data set contains unstructured data","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear understanding of covid-19 knowledge","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of relative humidity on uv effectiveness against bacteria and viruses","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent impact of rh on bioaerosol particle size","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on the impact of rh on bioaerosol particle size","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uv susceptibility of viral aerosols varies with different viruses and rh levels, affecting the effectiveness of uv-c disinfection","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uv radiation mapping shows variability in uv exposure levels across the chamber.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing the effects of nebulization on the survival of viruses.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data on the effectiveness of uv air disinfection in preventing airborne transmission of viral aerosols such as sars coronavirus.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain relationship between relative humidity rh and uv inactivation rate of bacterial aerosols.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unknown uv susceptibility of pathogenic viral aerosols under varying relative humidity rh conditions.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data on uvgi inactivation of viral aerosols","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of uvgi on different airborne microorganisms","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate positioning of uv tubes for germicidal sources resulting in ineffective disinfection of ventilation ducts and flowing air.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate calculation of required power input for uv tubes leading to underperformance or excessive energy consumption.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortened life cycle of fluorescent lamps due to excessive switching cycles","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to monitor uv-c system operating hours and power output","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of equal adoption of strava across cycling and pedestrian communities","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of homogenous strava adoption over the city of oslo","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of google search query data as proxy indicators may not fully capture outdoor recreational intention.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on strava data as a representation of recreational activity may not capture the full spectrum of users, potentially skewing the results.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of relative estimates into absolute activity numbers may introduce errors due to calibration and sampling limitations.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detrending the time series data to account for the long-term trend in strava data may oversimplify the analysis and mask important variations in activity patterns.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on domestic manufacturing and shorter supply chains may reconfigure the highly emissions-intensive maritime transportation sector, potentially leading to localized outbreaks of contagious diseases in manufacturing facilities.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on digital technologies for epidemic monitoring and control","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-speed network reliance for tracking strategic locations and infected patients","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry 4.0 and medicine 4.0 adoption","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for innovative and emerging technologies to combat the pandemic","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot for operational continuity during pandemics or emergencies","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of seamless integration of data from different sources may result in inaccurate or unreliable information being shared with travelers.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
